Title: Relates to county-wide shared services panels
Summary: Relates to county-wide shared services panels; includes library districts within county-wide shared services panels; establishes the municipal efficiency fund to provide counties with awards of matching funds upon certification by the department of state.
LawCode: Amd ยง239-bb, Gen Muni L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to county-wide shared services panels; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the municipal efficiency fund
